Hanuahuola bintu bia mu madimi enu, ne kafulaminyi kadi kanukuata bua kushiya bisumbu bikuabo mu madimi enu, kanuhinganyi bua kubiangata; nebikale bia benyi ne bia bana ba nshiya ne bia bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Kadi nansha nanku, kabeena mwa kwanji kwimanyika midimu ya kabadi ka kabwendela to
Panudi numuangala, amu bena Levi nebatulakaje nzubu wa tshijila awu, bua kuya kumuasa kabidi muaba unudi nuya
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu udi ufila mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa nealue ne tshituha tshia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye nealue ne mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia mu bianza biandi, nealue ne dianyi ne tshiadi, nebatshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa

Tshiena ne bukole bua kunulombola kabidi to

Noa wakenza nunku, wakenza muanda yonso yakamuambila Nzambi

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila

Bakatuala nsubu wa tshitendelelu, Ntenta mene, kudi Mose, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo, ne nkanu ne mabaya, ne mitshi ne makunshi ne masoso a tshiamu, ne tshintu tshia biseba bia bimpanga tshima mu mai makunze kunzû tshia kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu, ne tshintu tshia biseba bia nkonge tshia kuteka ha mutu hatshi, ne tshilulu tshia hankatshi ha nsubu, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne mesa, ne malonga onso a mesa, ne bidia bilesha, ne bitekelu bia minda, ne minda ne malonga au onso, ne manyi a minda, ne tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia or, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne musenga wa manananshi, ne tshilulu tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne mitshi yatshi, ne malonga atshi onso, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela, ne makunshi a luhangu ne nkanu, ne tshilulu tshia tshibi tshia luhangu, ne mionshi yonso ne milonda ne bintu bionso bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mbia ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bilulu bitedibue bimpe bia kuenza n abi mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona muakuidi, ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume bia kuenza n abi mudimu wa buakuidi

Esetê Mukelenge Mukashi Washeti Udi Ubenga Dî dia Ahashawelosha Mu matuku a Ahashawelosha Ahashawelosha eu nguakakokesha bantu ku Inde tô ne ku Atiopa ba mu nseke lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete , mu matuku au mene hakashikama Ahashawelosha mu nkuasa wa bukelenge buandi wakadi mu nsubu wandi wa mu Shushana, mu tshidimu tshisatu tshia bukokeshi buandi yeye wakalambishila bantu bandi banene ne bena mudimu bandi bidia bia disanka; bena bukole ba Bena Pelasa ne Bena Madai, bantu banene ne bana ba bakelenge ba mu nseke yonso, bakadi ku mpala kuandi; yeye wakabalesha bubanji bua butumbi, ne bu mudiye ne buneme mu bukelenge, matuku a bungi bu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu mene

Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Sadoka ne Eyebatâ bakaya ne mushete wa Nzambi ku Yelushalema kabidi: bakashikamaku
Nuyiteke kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakubikula: ka nunku ndi nkuelela mukenji eu lelu
Kadi kuaka nenukebe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusangakene n andi hanuamukeba ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Udi ubiumpuila mbuji awu
Meme kutuluka kabidi ku mukuna, kuteka mabue awu mu mushete umvua muenze, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mungambile
Genese Ditengula nTshimanyinu tshia Tshihungidi Hakadi Abalama ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema, Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamuambila ne, Ndi Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso, wenda ku mpala kuanyi, wikale muakane
Nujadike ne: buloba ne budi ne bufuke, anyi budi buatuka
Muana wa mukoku udi mushale, uundambule dilolu, padi diba dibuela, pamue ne bintu binuvua basakidile dinda

Nebanutumine munyinyi, bualu Maweja Nangila mumvue miadi yenu ne: Udi mua kutupesha munyinyi nnganyi
Badi babiaasa ne bidi bienza midimu yabi bidilekelela, mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bîmpe
Hashishe Yoshua wakakula ne Yehowa mu dituku diakafila Yehowa Bena Amole mu bianza bia Bena Isalele; ne ku mesu kua Bena Isalele yeye wakamba ne, Diba, imane biebe talalâ ku Gibeona; ne wewe, ngondo, mu tshibanda tshia Ayalona
Amasa wakadi muana wa muntu dina diandi Yitela, Muena Isalele, wakabuela kudi Abigayila, muana wa Nahasha, muan abo mukashi ne Seluya, mamu wa Yoaba
Wakabuela mu luesu; wakamba ne, Uhongoluele bantu, badie

Tshisangilu tshia ntwadijilu badi batshilombola kudi mufundi wa mikanda wa dipoko wa buludiki bwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Bakalua ne Mose ne Alona kudi Palo, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa Nzambi wenu kadi badi bamba kuya mbanganyi
Pashishe bavua baalamba mu ngesu, nansha baenza mikata
Bakanuisha tatu wabo nvinyo butuku abu, ne muaba bute wakabuela, wakalala ne tatu wandi, tatu wandi kakamanya hakalaleye ne hakabikeye
Kanudi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu, anyi tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, anyi tshia manyi enu, anyi tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu: nansha milambu yenu mudi nuditshiha n ai, nansha bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, nansha milambu idibo bakuha: kadi nubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi, ne Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu: nuikale ne disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Badi batshilombola kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neabake mukashi au
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshimue tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Omeli wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele; wakabakokesha bidimu dikumi ne bibidi; wakabakokesha bidimu bisambombo mu Tîsa
Davidi wakatuma batentekedi, wakajingulula ne bulelela, Shaula wakalua
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bibidi tshia bukelenge bua Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, Ahazaya, muana wa Yeholama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha
Tshibilu tshia kumpala tshikale tshia mampa adi kaayi mela buanga
Yoshua Wakenza tuele atu, wakatengula Bena Isalele ku muaba udibo babikila ne, Mukuna wa tshitenguidi
Numanye bienu lelu, bualu bua tshiena ngakula ne bana benu badi kabayi bamanye, badi kabayi banze kutangila malu akanuyishabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Wewe ulualua ne ditalala, anyi
Wakaya, wakasangana tshitalu tshiandi mu nshila ne mpunda ne nyama wa ntambue bimane ha buihi n atshi; nyama wa ntambue kakadia tshitalu tshiandi, kakahandulula mpunda
Nunku Davidi wakalota Muena Peleshete bukole ku tshieledi ne dibue; wakataha Muena Peleshete, wakamushiha; kadi Davidi kakadi ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi
Meku aa avua kabidi ne biota ebi: tshiota tshia bena Libni, tshia bena Ebrone, tshia bena Mali, tshia bena Mushi ne tshia bena Kora
Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile kabidi, ne biamba disama kushika, bikaladi kadiyi ditampakana mu dikoba diandi, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, disama edi didi bu tshilamulamu, muntu eu neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale mua kane
Nuenu nuelangane meji mu mitshima yenu ne, Bu mudi tatu ukengesha muan andi mulume, nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanukengesha
Bakuidi bakimana mu milongo muakadi midimu yabo; Bena Lewi bakadi ne bintu bia kuimbila n abi Yehowa misambu, biakenzabo kudi Davidi bua kusakidila n abi Yehowa bua luse luandi ludi lujalame tshiendelele hakadi Davidi utumbisha n abi Nzambi; bakuidi bakela mpungi ku mpala kuabo; Bena Isalele bonso bakadi bimana kulu
Bualu muntu udi wenza nanku, udi bu mutshi wa lulengu munkatshi mua bantu

Nenuikale bu dikema ne bu lusumuinu ne bu bihendu kudi bisamba bionso bidi Yehowa mulela munkatshi muabi

Neanunyenge tshia dikumi tshia maminu enu ne tshia tumuma tuenu tua nvinyo, neatshidie kudi tuhita tuandi ne kudi bahika bandi
Diba dipatuka, Yakobe kumuka ku dilobu dia Penuyele, wenda utebuka, bualu tshikundukundu tshivua tshikoyoboke
Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua bua kuluangana n andi, wakamusuika nkanu bua kuya n andi ku Babulona

Yonadaba wakamuambila ne, Lala ha bulalu buebe bu muntu udi ne disama; halua tatu webe kukutangila, umuambile ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Anji kuitabusha bua muan etu wa bakashi Tamâ alue bua kundisheye bidia, alongolole bia kudia anu ku mesu kuanyi, bua meme mbitangile, mbidie anu ku tshianza tshiandi
Bena Levi badi bapingana pa muaba wa bamuanabute Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubadike bamuanabute bonsu ba balume ba bena Izrayele, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, ufunde mena abu
Wangate mafuta onsu adi ku mala, tuonyi ne mafuta atu, ne lutandatanda lua ku mutshima, ubioshe pa tshilambuilu

Kadi biakudia bivua mu Ejipitu
Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Bobo nebenze mukaba wa efoda bu mudibo benza efoda, newikale tshituha tshimue tshia ku efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe
Nengangate bidia bianyi ne mai anyi ne munyinyi wanyi unakashihela bakoshi banyi ba miosa ya mikoko bua kubifila kudi bantu bandi tshiyi mumanye kuakafumabo, anyi
Ku nyima kua malu â, Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakahunga tshihungidi ne Ahazaya, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakadi wenza malu mabi be; wakadisangisha n andi hua kuasa matu a kuya n au ku Tâshishi; bakasa matu mu Esione gebê
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi
Nzambi wanyi, unvuluke bua kungenzela bimpe bua malu onso anakuenzela bantu aba
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu nkadi ne tshia kutangila dilomba adi, mu tshipungu tshia ngondo umwe

Ulekele muana, apingane ne bana babu kuetu

Hashika matuku a kudilengesha kuandi, nansha matuku a muana wa balume nansha a muana wa bakashi, yeye nealue ne muana wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mputu nyunyu anyi nyunyu wa nkutshi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, kudi muakuidi, ne yeye neayifile ku mpala kua Yehowa, bua kumubuikidila n au bubi; yeye neikale mulengeshibue kudi mashi andi

Yeye wakamukudimuna di ne, Ndi muana wa Betuele, muana mulume wa Mileka, wakaleleleye Naho

Ndi nebe

Pashishe muntu kampande awu kuambila Yakobe ne: Ndekela nya, bualu butuku mbumane kutshia
Bâsha wakamushiha ku musoko wa Gibetona mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete, bualu bua Nadaba ne Bena Isalele bonso bakatshintshimika musoko wa Gibetona
Nunku yeye wakalala ku makasa andi tô ne dinda wakabika diambedi muntu kayi mua kumona ngana ne mukuabo; Boaza wakamba ne, Bualu ebu kabumanyibu ne, Mukashi wakalua ku tshishihuidi
Muntu au wakambila Yoaba ne, Nansha wewe mumpe binunu dikumi bia argent mu tshianza tshianyi, tshiakadi kulenga tshianza tshianyi ham bidi ha muana wa mukelenge; bualu bua mukelenge wakanuambila ne Abishai ne Itai mu matshu etu ne, Dimukai, kanulengi nsongalume Abashaloma tshianza
Gideona wakambila Nzambi ne, Biwasua kusungila Bena Isalele ku tshianza tshianyi bu muwakamba, tangila, nenteke miosa ya mikoko hanshi mu tshishihuidi; bikala mume anu ha miosa ne buloba buonso budi bûme, hashishe nemmanye ne, Wewe neusungile Bena Isalele ku tshianza tshianyi bu muwakamba
Muntu mushipangane disu, bamushipe diende

Kadi kena mupete tshintu to

Lewitiki Milambu ya Mibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bienza muntu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia, bienza muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu bualu bubi budi buhisha bantu, yeye nealele mulambu wa muana wa ngombe udi kayi ne tshitema kudi Yehowa, bu mulambu wa kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Bidimenene abi, nebabidie kabidi kudi bimuna bienu, ne kudi nyama ya tshisuku idi mu ditunga dienu
Ahaba wakaya bua kusangileye ne Eliya

Au mmeku a Dana ku meku abo

Pashishe, mutuangaji neatshikenkete kabidi
Kadi bua kubapepejila mudimu ewu, ubapeshe mfumu umue ku tshisamba tshionsu, bilondangane mushindu ewu: Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Yuda; Yemuyele, muana wa Amikude, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Shimeyone; Elidade, muana wa Kislone, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Binyamine; Buki, muana wa Yogli, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Dane; Aniyele, muana wa Efode, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Menashe, muana wa Yozefe; Kemuyele, muana wa Shiftane, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Efrayime, muana wa Yozefe; Elishafane, muana wa Pamake, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Zebulone; Paltiyele, muana wa Azane, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Isakare; Ahihude, muana wa Shelomi, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Ashere; Pedahele, muana wa Amikude, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Naftali
Wewe, Ezela, bu mudi lungenyi lua Nzambi webe lûdi n alu mu tshianza tshiebe, sungula balumbuluishi banene ne ba juge bua bobo balumbuluile bantu bonso badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, bonso badi bamanye mikenji ya Nzambi webe; uyishe yonso udi kayi muyimanye
Dutelonone Binuatangila nansha ngombe nansha mukoko bia mukuenu bihambuka, kusokoki bualu ebu kudiye, kadi ubihingashe kudi mukuenu
Bantu benyi aba nebanyishe bua kuasa mu ditunga dietu, kabidi bua kushala netu bantu bamue, kadi anu padibu bateka bantu balume bonsu panshi bu mudibu bobu
Nanku ku bidimu bisatu bisatu, numushe tshia dikumi tshia bia mu madimi enu bia tshidimu atshi, nutshiteke mu bimenga bienu
Mukelenge wetu ambile bena mudimu badi ku mpala kuandi ne, Nuye, nunkebele muntu udi mumanye mua kungimbila tshisanji bimpe: hashishe halua nyuma mubi mufume kudi Nzambi kudi, yeye neimbe tshisanji ne tshianza tshiandi ne wewe newikale bimpe
Nunku nenumushe mashi adi kâyi ne tshilumbu munkatshi muenu hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa

Bualu kai nuakatuhatula mu Ejipitu bua kulua n etu mu muaba eu mubi

Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, ne bantu babidi bakadi kumanya mua kuihata binunu dikumi bia bantu munyi, bikala Dibue kadiyi dibahane, ne Yehowa kayi mubafile kudibo

Samuele, Mulumbuluishi wa Bena Isalele Samuele wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Binuasua kuhingana kudi Yehowa ne mitshima yenu yonso, nunku numushe nzambi ya bende ne ya Bashela munkatshi muenu, kudimunai mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, numukuatshile yeye nkayandi mudimu; ne yeye neanusungile mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Bimuna bionsu abi, kabikadi ne bulema pambidi to
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuha buloba abu bu buhianyi: bena nvita nebasabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua bana benu ba Bena Isalele
Shela ne meku a Bena Shela, Pelese ne meku a Bena Pelese, Zela ne meku a Bena Zela
Bibi bionso ne biluwa bionso biakadi bunene bumue; ne bibi bia ha masoso biakatangilangana mu milongo isatu
Mose wakambila Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena ne, Nudi basue bana benu baye ku nvita, ne nuenu nushikame kunoko, anyi
Nanku nenuikale bena diakalenga, nenukuate ditunga dimpe, divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu
Bana balume ba Yokeshana: Sheba ne Dedana
Nunemeke ndondu wenu ne Mvidi Mukulu Nuenu bena Izrayele, lelu nudi bimane bonsu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, pamue ne bamfumu ba midimu mishilangane, bakulu ba ditunga, bana benu, bakaji benu, ne benyi badi basombe munkatshi muenu mu mitanda, badi bamunguila nkunyi, banusunyina mayi
Kabidi bimuna bienu kabienji mudimu to
Abimeleke kupingajila Abrahame mukajende
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu, yeye neanuluile nvita yenu, bu muakenzeye ku mesu kuenu mu Ejipitu, ne mu tshihela, nuakatangila ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanutuala mu maboko, bu mudi tatu utuala muan andi mulume, mu nshila yonso inuakaya tô ne hanuakalua ku muaba eu
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muku wandi udi ne mulau
Nutshipe amu mu dina diende
Mutentekedi wakatangila muntu mukuabo ulua lubilu; mutentekedi wakambila mulami wa tshibi ne, Mona muntu mukuabo udi ulua lubilu nkayandi
Yeye wakatangisha bituha bia argent tshinunu tshimue ne lukama lumue kudi mamu wandi; mamu wandi wakamba ne, Ndi njidila Yehowa argent ku tshianza tshianyi bualu bua muan anyi, bua kusongeye n ai mpingu ne bua kutuleye n ai mpingu; nunku nenkuhingishileyi
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Hakahita matuku asatu ku nyima bamane kuhunga n abo tshihungidi, bakunvua lumu ne bobo bakadi n abo mutumba, bakashikama munkatshi muabo
Nutangile mudi bena ditunga: badi ba bungi anyi mbakese
Nudie tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu ne tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia ne tshia manyi enu ne tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne tshia ba mikoko yenu ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; nunku nenubale bualu bua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku onso
Kuelaye kasala, wimba ne: Meme, ndi Balaame muana wa Beyore, umvuayi tshindi ngamba

Kuambaye ne: Maweja Nangila uvua mumone dikenga dianyi Mpindiewu bayanyi neanange
Bakela Bena Benyamina munkatshi, bakabihata, bakabadiata ku miaba yakambabo kuikisha tô ne ku Gibea kudi kuhatukila diba
Biakuenzelabo bibi ne kakuena muntu udi kayi wenza malu mabi ne wewe udi n abo tshiji, udi ubafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo bua kuyabo n abo bu bahika mu buloba bua bena lukuna, mu buloba budi kule anyi budi ha buihi; kadi biabangabo kuelangana meji munda muabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo, biakutendekenabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, bamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi, tuakuenza bualu buhote, tuakahambuka; biahinganabo kûdi ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso, mu buloba bua bena lukuna babo bakababuesha mu buhika, biakutendelelabo ne mesu abo matangile ku buloba buabo buwakaha bankambua babo, ne ku musoko eu uwakusungula, ne ku nsubu eu unakuashila dina diebe; unvue kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu kûdi ushikama, ujadike bualu buabo
Anu dituku adi, Nowa kubuela mu buatu ne mukajende ne bana bende: Sheme, Kame ne Yefete, ne bakaji babu basatu

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Kababikidi dina diebe ne Yakoba kabidi bakubikile dina ne Isalele bualu bua wewe wakuluangana ne Nzambi ne bantu, wakahatula bukole
Bakashikama ku mpala kuandi, muntu ku mulongo wandi muntu ku mulongo wandi, wakatuadishila ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, balume aba bakakemangana
Nusangishe bakulu benu bonso ba mu bisamba bienu ne tuhita tuenu kundi, bua meme kubambila mei â onso ku matshu abo, nembikile diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu kudibo
Madiyane uvua mulele bana ba balume batanu: Efa, Efere, Anoke, Abida ne Elda
Kadi nenubenzele nunku: nushihe bishihelu biabo, nuele mabue abo hanshi adibo batendelela, nutahe Bashela babo, nuoshe mpingu yabo ne kahia
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yehoyakima ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Tela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Abalama ne Nahô ne Halana
Davidi wakamukudimuna ne, Tuakuya ku luseke lua ku Sude lua Yuda ne lua Bena Yelamele ne lua Bena Keni
Hashishe hanuakunvua dî diakadi munkatshi mua midima, hakadi mukuna mutema kahia, nuenu nuakalua kundi, ne ba ku mutu kua bisamba bienu ne bakulu benu; nuakamba ne, Tangila, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafuisha butumbi buandi ne bunene buandi, tuakulua dî diandi munkatshi mua kahia: tuakatangila lelu ne Nzambi udi usomba ne muntu, ne yeye udi wikala ne muoyo

Padi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu unuambuluisha bua nutshikuate, nushipemu bantu balume bonsu

Kadi kanuenji Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku
Sala, mukashi wa mukelenge wanyi, wakamulelela muana mulume hakadiye muntu mununu, yeye wakadia muana eu bintu bionso bidiye n abi
Nunku ufuile muntu webe luse, bualu bua wewe wakamana kuhunga n anyi tshihungidi mu dina dia Yehowa; bikala bualu bubi munda muanyi, unshihe nkayebe; udi musue kulua n anyi ku mesu kua tatu webe bishi
Hashishe bantu bandi bakasemena ha buihi n andi, bakamukonka ne, Tatu wetu, bu muprofete mukuambile bua wewe kuenza bualu bunene, kuakadi kubuenza, anyi
Muntu yonso udi ulumbuluisha benyi anyi bana ba nshiya anyi bakashi ba mu lufuila dilumbulula didi kadiyi diakane udi ne mulau
Bikala muntu muhele, kanuladi tulu ne tshieya tshiandi; nuhingashe tshieya tshiandi habuela diba, bua yeye alale tulu ne tshilulu tshiandi, anuvudishile disanka; bualu ebu nebuikale buakane kunudi, ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Bakatshidi halua kudiye ne bintu biakadi mitshima yabo misue ku dinda ku dinda
Eu udi mukenji wa mukau hasesuka mukashi bua kulala ne mundi udi kayi mulume wandi ne yeye udi muonyibue, anyi hakuata mulume mukau bualu bua mukashi wandi, nunku yeye neashikike mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashishe muakuidi neashikishe mukenji eu wonso kudi mukashi

Mukashi wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi ambe dî diandi

Akisha wakakudimuna baminyampala ba Bena Peleshete ne, Eu ke nDavidi, muntu wa Shaula, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakadi n anyi matuku â, nansha bidimu ebi, undi tshiyi musangane bualu bubi kudiye ku dituku diakalueye tô ne katataka, anyi
Yozefe kusomba ku nzubu kua mfumuende, muena Ejipitu
Binuateleja matshu bimpe ku mikenji inakunuambila lelu, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kungenzela mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso, hashishe nentume nvula ha buloba buenu mu tshidimu tshia nvula, ne nvula ya mbedi ne nvula ya ku nyima; nenumanye mua kuhuola manvua enu ne kukama nvinyo mihia mihia ne manyi enu
Kanusangishi mei ha mutu ha dî dinakanuambila, kanumushi mei ku dî adi; bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Nakanuambila
Yeye kakadihuekesha ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Manashe tatu wandi hakadihuekesheye; kadi Amona eu wakatamba kuenzenza malu mabi
Diambedi Bena Sulia bakamuangalaka mu matunga, bakafuma ku buloba bua Isalele ne nsongakashi mukese bu muhika; yeye wakakuatshila mukashi wa Nâmana mudimu
Dielulula Bena Izrayele badi batshimuna mukalenga Oge Pashishe tuetu kubenda bua kupitshila mu ditunga dia Bashane
Hashishe Davidi wakambila Muena Peleshete ne, Wewe udi ulua kundi ne muele wa nvita ne difuma ne difuma dia kabenda, kadi meme ndualua kudi mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa bena nvita ba Bena Isalele uwakafunyina bulobo ku mpala kuandi
Mukashi wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, hakamumoneye ne muana muimpe, wakamusokoka ngondo isatu

Bobo nebayishe bana ba Yakoba mei ebe, ne Bena Isalele mikenji yebe; nebateke musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kuebe, ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshiebe
Bualu bua nvita yakadi ku nseke yonso ya buloba; bantu bakafua mu ditu bakahita bantu bakashihibua ku miele ya nvita bungi

Kadi wakahana bintu, Wakenza bualu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa

Kanusuiki nkata ku mishiku ya ngombe udi udiata mponda
Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa wakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, atumbishibue, wakambila tatu wanyi Davidi mukana muandi, bualu buakamana tshianza tshiandi lelu ne, Katshia ngumuka ne bantu banyi Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu, tshiakasungula musoko munkatshi mua bisamba bia Bena Isalele wa kuasamu nsubu, bua dina dianyi dikalemu; kadi nakasungula Davidi bua kuikaleye ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele
Muntu yônso udi pende ne bukookeshi bwa kuleeja ditabuuja diende anyi majadika ende, bu mudi mu ngakwilu, mu mifundu ne bimfwanyi, anu mwikala kabidi uneemeka mêyi ne mikandu, bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowo

Wakundinga nunku bua tshinyi
Biwatutuma ne muan etu, netuye, ne tukusumbile bia kudia, kadi biwahidia kututuma n andi, katuena tuyaku, bualu bua mulume au waka tuambila ne, Kanuena nuntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakunyi enu kundi

Kanutshinyi bisamba ebi to
Kuaka nenutendelele nzambi mikuabo yakasongabo ne mitshi ne mabue, kayena mua kutangila anyi mua kunvua anyi mua kudia anyi mua kununkila
Hanuakuna matamba a mitshi yenu ya olive bua mamuma ahone, kanuakumi tshiakabidi; neashale a benyi ne a bana ba nshiya ne a bakashi ba mu lufuila
Nzambi wakamuambila mu tshiota ne, Bulelela, ndi mumanye ne wewe wakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima webe, nakakuhidisha kabidi bua kuenza bualu bubi ku mesu kuanyi, nunku tshiakuitabusha bua wewe kumulenga tshianza
Muntu yonso aditekele kakasu mu bintu biandi bia nvita, ne hayeye mu tshisuku, neaumbule dina, neahingashe buloba ha mutu ha bintu biakahuyeye; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi wendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu bua kunusungila, ne bua kufila badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu; nunku tshitudilu netshikale tshia tshijila
Tshihiminu etshi tshidi bu tshia dikumi tshia épha

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Buhidia Buabo Hashishe halua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, n enu mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kunuhabu, misoko minene ne miakane mudi kanuyi bibake, ne nsubu miule tente ne bintu bimpe mudi kanuyi bûshe, ne mena a mai akumbulabo, anudi kanuyi bumbule, ne madimi a tumuma tukese ne mitshi ya olive, binudi kanuyi bakune; nuenu nenudie, nenukute mafu tente; hashishe nudimukai, bua kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka

Binuasangana disua dia nyunyu mu nshila ku mutshi anyi ha buloba, ne bana ba nyunyu anyi makela bidimu, ne mukashi wa nyunyu udi ushikama ha bana anyi ha makela, kanuangatshi mukashi wa nyunyu ne bana bandi kabidi; nulekele mukashi wa nyunyu tshianana, kadi nudi mua kudiangatshila bana ba nyunyu; nunku malu enu neikale mimpe, nenuvudishe matuku enu

Bana ba Beteleheme, lukama ne makumi abidi ne basatu

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete hakadi mutshima wa mukelenge musanke ne nvinyo yeye wakatuma mukenji kudi Mehumana ne Bizeta ne Hâbona ne Bigata ne Abagata ne Zetâ ne Kakasa, bantu batungula muanda mutekete bakadi benza mudimu ku mesu kua mukelenge Ahashawelosha, bua kuluabo ne Washeti, mukelenge mukashi, ku mpala kua mukelenge muluate tshifulu tshia bukelenge bua kulesheye bantu ne bantu banene bulengele buandi; bualu bua yeye wakadi muimpe kumona
Kadi kanuenji Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku
Uvua muele meji kaayi pa kungenzela nunku
Bule bua dibaya dimue buakadi coudées dikumi, ne butshiama buadi buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha
Kushiminyinyi mukuenu bualu
Kadi malu mimpe makuabo adi munda muebe bualu bua wewe wakumusha mpingu ya Bashela ku buloba, wakajadika mutshima webe bua kukeba Yehowa
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama mai
Nenjimishe kudisua kunudi n aku bua bukole buenu, diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshifike ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku, nenuenze mudimu wenu tshianana bualu bua buloba kabuena bukuama bintu, ne mitshi ya mu buloba kayena ikuama mamuma
Kumonabu ditunga dia Yazere ne dia Ngilaade abalengelela bua kumunyinabu bimuna
Ku mikuna: Shamî ne Yatî ne Soko, ne Dana ne Kîyata sana eu udi Debî kabidi , ne Anaba ne Eshetemo ne Anima, ne Goshene ne Holona ne Gilo; bimenga dikumi ne tshimue ne misoko yabi
Nuikale anu ne tshiamu tshimue tshidi tshiakane, ne tshihiminu tshimue tshidi tshiakane; nunku matuku enu neikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Ndi mumane kubapesha ditunga edi
Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nealame biakudia bionsu binudi bateke mu mayeba enu
Bobo bakaya ku mikuna, bakalua mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatentekela buloba
Kadi badi ne bua kuya menemene mbanganyi
Katataka bikai bienu, nusabuke kasulu ka Zelede; tuakasabuka kasulu ka Zelede
Nuenu nenuenze bualu ebu: tshituha tshienu tshisatu tshia bakuidi ne Bena Lewi badi babuelamu dituku dia lumingu netshikale bu bambudi ba bintu ku bibuelelu bia nsubu; tshituha tshienu tshisatu tshikuabo netshikale ku nsubu kua mukelenge; ne tshituha tshienu tshisatu tshikuabo netshikale ku tshibi tshidi kumanda kua nsubu; bantu bonso bakuabo nebikale mu biendedi bia nsubu wa Yehowa
Badi Bahita Bena Isalele Bukole ku Hôma Nom
Kuinyikabu muaba awu dina ne: Tabera, mmumue ne: kapia, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua muoshe mitanda yabu muaba awu
Misoko ya Kunyemena ya ku Esete kua Yadene Hashishe Mose wakasungula misoko ya kunyemena isatu dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; bualu bua mushihi wa muntu ku mpukahuka, wakadi kayi n andi lukuna diambedi, anyemene ku umue wa mu misoko ei, ikale biandi ne muoyo
Pikala Arone mumane kufua, bilamba biende bia tshijila nebabiangate anu kudi ndelanganyi yende
Nenkuele lupemba
Kanuena mua kutua nabu ndondu, kanuena mua kubafuila luse
Numanye bienu ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi mene; Nzambi utu walamata dî diandi, utu watumikila tshihungidi tshiandi ne luse luandi kudi bantu badi bamusue ne batu batumikila mikenji yandi tô ne ku bihungu tshinunu; utu wafuta bantu badi n andi lukuna difutu diabo ku mesu kuabo, bua kubashiha: yeye kena uhanga muntu udi n andi lukuna, neamufute ku mesu kuandi
Bantu bonso nebunvue mei abo, nebatshine, kabena benza malu a tshitshu kabidi
Kabakadi ne musungula bualu bua musoko wakadi kule ne Sidona, ne bobo kabakabuelakana ne bantu bakuabo; musoko eu wakadi mu tshibanda tshia ha buihi ne Bete lehoba
Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia
Muntu udi udia munyinyi wandi neuvuwe bilulu, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, ne mundi udi utuala mubidi wandi mufue neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Bana babo bakaya ku Shekeme bua kudishabo bimuna bia tatu abo Isalele wakebesha Yosefe ne, Bana benu kabena badisha bimuna ku Shekeme, anyi
Kadi Maweja Nangila kushala muaba uvua Abrahame
Bantu kai bakumpa dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudibo munkatshi mua kahia, bu munuakadiunvua, ne bakikala ne muoyo
Katataka, Yehowa, tuakulua ne bintu biakaboba diambedi mu buloba buwakutuha
Kadi asakidile tshia bitanu tshimue ku mushinga udi mutuangaji mulombe
Neanusankishe kabidi mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi
Yonatana wakambila nsongalume, muambudi wa ngabu wandi, ne, Lua, tuye bietu kudi masalayi au adi kâyi matengula, biasua Yehowa kutukuatshisha; bualu bua kakuena mukandu kudi Yehowa bua kusungila bantu kudi ba bungi anyi kudi bakese
Tshiole tshiakashala mu buloba bidimu bibidi, ne bidimu bitanu bidi bishala bidibo kabayi badima, kabayi bahuola bintu
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ebu mbuloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe tunkanunuina tuenu, nakukuleshabu ne mesu ebe, kadi wewe kuena usabukaku
Nsombelu wa batuangaji Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe batuangaji, bana ba Arone, mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Mutuangaji kena ne bua kusemena pabuipi ne tshitalu tshia muntu wa mu diku diabu to
Bukookeshi bwa kweela mwadi pa nkoselu wa tshilumbu budi bujadikibwa bwa muntu yônso
Yeye neangate bana benu ba bakashi bua kumusumbilabo manananshi ne bua kumulambilabo bia kudia
Bakalenga ba bisamba bishilangane nebapatukile ku ndelanganyi yende
Mu dituku dia muanda mukulu yeye wakatuma bantu kuabo; bobo bakavudishila mukelenge disanka; bakaya ku nsubu yabo ne disanka dinene mu mitshima yabo hua malu mimpe onso akenzela Yehowa muntu wandi Davidi ne bantu bandi Bena Isalele
Kushe kulela kabidi Nimrode, tshilobu tshia kumpala tshivua tshidia bumfumu mu matunga a bende
Dutelonone Badi Kabayi Mua Kubuela mu Masangisha Muntu udi mutaha mputa ku mihesa yandi anyi udi ne mihesa mikosoke kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa
Nanku netumvuangane tuselelangane, tusombe nenu mu ditunga emu, tushale bantu bamue
Neumuinyike ne Izake
Nakatshidi bidimu makumi anai hakantuma Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, ku Kadeshe bânea bua kutentekela buloba; nakahingana kudiye kabidi ne dî diakadi mu mutshima wanyi
Yeshuluna, kakuena mukuabo bu Nzambi, udi ushikama biandi mu diulu bua kukukuatshisha: bulengele buandi budi ku mutu kua matutu
Nzambi wakamona munya ne Mmuimpe Nzambi wakatahulula munya ne midima
Nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada buloba buonso ku Gilada tô ne ku hankatshi ha tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku kasulu ka Yaboka ku butshika bua Bena Amona; ne buloba bua Alabâ kabidi ne tshibanda tshia Yadene ku Kinelete tô ne ku dishiha dia Alabâ, Dishiba dia Luehu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega ku esete
Bintu ebi bidi tshituha tshia bakuidi kudi bantu badi bafila milambu ya kuosha, nansha ngombe nansha mukoko: bobo nebahe bakuidi diboko ne matama abidi ne tshiadi
Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi witaba bua baye ne Binyamine mu Ejipitu Tshiyole tshia nzala kupita bukole mu Kenaane
Hashishe Hamana wakangata bilulu ne kabalu, wakabiluatshisha Môdekai, wakamuendesha ha nyima ha kabalu mu musesu wa musoko, wakela dî ku mpala kuandi ne
Biadia muntu tshintu tshia tshijila ku mpukahuka, yeye neasangishe tshintu tshitanu ha mutu hatshi, neahe muakuidi tshintu tshia tshijila
Lehabama wakananga Mâka, muana wa Abashaloma, ha mutu ha bakashi bandi bonso ne bakashi bahika bakadiye mubake bualu bua yeye wakabaka bakashi dikumi ne muanda mukulu ne bakashi bahika makumi asambombo; wakalela n abo bana ba balume makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu ne ba bakashi makumi asambombo
Bakamuambila ne, Tuakuluila bua kukusuika, ne bua tuetu tukufile mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Yuda umona bintu abi, kubimanyaye
Bingambila nsongalume ne, Tangila, mikete idi luseke lûdi, uyangate, ulue n ai; bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ditalala didi kûdi, kakuena bualu bubi
Uvua mumfikile munda bikole bualu buenu, unkandika ne: Kuajiki
Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, wakadi ku mutu kua masalayi andi; Yehoshafata, muana wa Ahiluda, wakadi mufundi wa malu a bukelenge; Sadoka, muana wa Ahituba, ne Ahimeleke, muana wa Ebeyatâ, bakadi bakuidi; Selaya wakadi mufundi
Hashishe Hezikiya wakamba ne, Tuakadi idila kudi Yehowa; semenai ha buihi ne milambu ya kusakidila n ai Yehowa mu nsubu wandi
Hashishe tshiji tshia Shaula tshiakatema kudi Yonatana, wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi muana wa mukashi mubi, muena mampaka, meme tshiena mumanye ne, Wewe wakasungula muana wa Yishai bua kufuisheye wewe ne mamu ebe wakakula bundu, anyi
Bivua bitoke bifuanangane ne ntete ya koriandre
Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele bakadi bungi bua nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene; badiadia, banuanua, basankasanka
Bena Lewi; Yeshua, muana wa Azanaya, ne Binui, umue wa bana ba Henadada, ne Kadamiele, ne bana babo, Shebanya, Hodiya, Kelita, Pelaya, Hanana, Mika, Lehoba, Hashabeya, Zaku, Shelebaya, Shebanya, Hodiya, Bani ne Beninu
Bualu ebu buakadi butekete ku mesu kuandi bua kuendeye mu malu mabi a Yalohama, muana wa Nebata: nunku wakabaka Izebele, muana wa bakashi wa Etebâla, mukelenge wa Bena Sidona, wakakuatshila Bâla mudimu, wakamutendelela
Meme tshiena muhite bana ba balume dikumi kudi, anyi
Dina diende didi ne bua kujimina mu diku dietu, bua padiye kayi mulele muana wa balume anyi
Boaza wakambila bakulu ne bantu aba bonso ne, Nuenu nudi bamanyi ba bualu lelu ne, Meme nakusumba bintu bionso bia Elimeleke ne bia Kiliona ne bia Malona ku tshianza tshia Naomi
Yakobe kuandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe uvua muntutshishe dikasa dimpe mu njila
Naomi wakabambila ne, Bana banyi, nu hingane, nuyaya n anyi bua tshinyi
Yeye wakitabusha Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakabala kuitabusha kuandi ne, Mbuakane buandi
Eyowa, ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Yehowa wakakengesha bantu bualu bua bobo bakenza kana ka ngombe kakadi Alona muenze
Hakadibo basankisha mitshima yabo, monai, bena musoko, bantu balembakane, bakanyunguluka nsubu, bakume ku tshibi; bakambila mukelenge wa nsubu muntu mununu ne, Lua ne muntu au wakalua mu nsubu muebe bua tuetu tumumanye
Kadi biamueneka mputa mutoke tô ku mutu kua muena dibala, anyi ha mpala hadi dibala, edi ndisama dia nsudi diakumueneka ku mutu kua muena dibala anyi ha mpala hadi dibala
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe ne Arone lukasa wamba ne: Ndi muenzele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu bibi ne nuenu kabidi
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Tangila mushiki eu ne dibue edi binakuimanyika hankatshi hetu
Nuenu nenutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nenubienze, nenushikame mu buloba talala
Lemeke mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, kulelaye muana wa balume
Kanutshipi mutshipu wa dishima, nutela dina dianyi, to
Hatuakunvua lumu alu, mitshima yetu yakahandika, kakuena muntu umue udi mushale ne dikima mu mutshima wandi bualu buenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa mu diulu ne ha buloba kabidi
Kadi hanuasabuka Yadene, hanuashikama mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhianyisha, udi unuha dikisha kudi bena lukuna bonso badi banunyunguluka, ne nenushikame talalâ
Bikala muntu munkatshi muenu udi kayi muakane bua malu akamukuata butuku, hashishe yeye neaye ku mpenge kua tshitudilu, kabuedi mu tshitudilu; kadi hafika dilolo, yeye neowe mai, ne habuela diba, yeye neahingane mu tshitudilu
Kadi bana benu bena Levi nebanulamate, banuambuluisha
Yoshua Bualu Bubi Buakenza Akana Kadi Bena Isalele bakenza bualu bubi ne tshintu tshia tshijila; bualu bua Akana, muana wa Kâmi, muana wa Zabedi, muana wa Zela wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakadiangatshila tshintu tshia tshijila; ne tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bualu bua Bena Isalele
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bukokeshi bua Ahazaya Kul
Bena Yuda Badi Banyenga Yelushalema ne Hebelone Bena Yuda bakaluangana ne Bena Yelushalema, bakaunyenga, bakashiha bena musoko ne muele wa nvita, bakosha tshimenga ne kahia
Dikopu dimue dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi dia bujitu bua grame , diwule ne manananshi a kuosha
Bakumuka ku Dishiba Dikunze, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sina
Yehowa wakunvua mei enu, wakadi n enu tshiji, wakaditshiha ne, Nansha muntu umue wa mu tshikondo etshi tshibi neatangile buloba ebu buimpe, bunakalaya batatu enu bua kunuhabu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, neabutangile; nemmuhe buloba buakadiateye muinshi mua makasa andi, ne kudi bana bandi, bualu bua yeye wakalonda Yehowa bulelela
Bimuna bionso bidi ne mikono mihanduluke, bidi bihingishilula bintu mukana: nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Numanye bienu lelu, bualu bua tshiena ngakula ne bana benu badi kabayi bamanye, badi kabayi banze kutangila malu akanuyishabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neabake mukashi au
Bana babo bakadi n andi mukau, kadi tatu wandi wakateka mei au mu mutshima wandi
Nvita yakadiku kabidi; Davidi wakaluhuka, wakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, wakabashiha ba bungi: bakanyema ku mesu kuandi
Nanku numupatule mu mitanda bua lumingu lujima kabidi
Hakamanabo kufila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, Yehu wakambila balami ne tupitene ne, Buelai, nubashihe, nansha umue kahatuki, Bakabashiha ku miele ya nvita; balami ne tupitene bakabimasha ha mbelu, bakabuela mu musoko muakadi nsubu wa Bâla
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe bu muakanulayeye; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi kanuena nusomba bintu kudibi; nuenu nenukokeshe bisamba bia bungi, kadi bisamba ebi kabiena binukokesha
Yeye kena usomba n etu kabidi, anyi
Moshe kusengelela Maweja Nangila
Davidi wakamba ne
Hashishe Davidi wakamba ne, Kanuena mua kuenza nunku, bana betu, ne bintu biakatuha Yehowa, wakatusungila, wakafila tshisumbu tshia bantu tshiakulua kutuluisha mu bianza bietu
Mukalenga, ndi mumane kukuambila ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi mukuleje malu adiye musue kuenza
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Kutuadija lelu, nenkuatshishe bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba bowa
Nuenu, badi babanda ha nyima ha tubalu tutoke, ambai bualu; nuenu bantu badi bashikama ha biala bia bubanji, ne nuenu badi benda mu nshila, ambai bualu ebu
Nunku Bena Isalele bakadi babadibua ku kulondolola kuabo; ne monai, badi bafundibue mu mukandu wa bakelenge ba Isalele; bakaya ne Bena Yuda mu buhika ku Babulona bualu bua ditomboka diabo
Bana ba Yakobe Maweja Nangila umona ne: Yakobe mmupite kunanga Rakele, kupeshaye Leya lulelu
Ku tshikondo atshi Yoshua wakalua, wakabutula Bena Anaka ba ku mikuna ne ku Hebelone ne ku Debî ne ku Anaba ne ku mikuna yonso ya Yuda ne ku mikuna yonso ya Isalele: Yoshua wakababutula ne misoko yabo
Biasanganabo muntu udi wiba muan abo umue wa Bena Isalele, udi umuenza bu muhika, anyi udi umuhana, hashishe nebashihe muibi: nunku nenûmusbe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Abimeleke wakamuebesha ne, Bualu buwakutuenzela budi tshinyi
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Sihona Bukole Nom
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bua bobo bavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Bua bualu ebu nakanuambila kahidi ne, Tshiena mbihata ku mpala kuenu, kadi bobo nebikale bu meba mu mbese yenu, ne nzambi yabo neyikale bu buteyi kunudi
Mose wakabikila Yoshua, wakamuambila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe uyaya ne bantu aba mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu babo bua kubahabu; ne wewe neubahianyishe buloba abu
Bobo bakadikuma hanshi, bakamba ne, Nzambi, Nzambi wa mioyo ya bantu, wewe newikale ne tshisumbu tshonso tshiji bua bubi bua mundi umue, anyi
Ngombe minyane muanda mutekete yakalonda ku nyima kuai idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, ne miehu yakafubidila ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole
Kubutulaye bilobu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bajimine mu Mayi manene makunze
Mvidi Mukulu neanuele lupemba Panudi nuitaba meyi anyi, nutumikila mikenji yanyi, nuyilonda, nendokeshe mvula pa diba diende, bua nupete biakudia bia bungi mu madimi enu, kabidi bua mitshi ikuame bimuma
Bua Gada yeye wakamba ne, Muntu wavudishila Gada disanka udi ne disanka: yeye udi walamina bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, yeye udi utula diboko ne lubombo lua ku mutu kabidi
Yeye wakamuambila ne Uluhuke, wimane ku mukuna ku mpala kua Yehowa
Mbuyi uvua mukunze, muikale ne boya pambidi, buenza bu tshinkutu
Pashishe patudi tupingana kuetu, mu njila, butuku buila, tuetu kulala
Bantu bonso bakadi bimana n andi bakumuka
Shaula wakakonka Yehowa lungenyi, kadi Yehowa kakamuitaba, nansha mu tshilota nansha ku Ulima, nansha kudi baprofete
Ke muudi ne bua kumusha bena Levi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele bakuabu
Muena mvita yonsu ikale ne tshikasu, bua padiye usesuka, ambule buloba, ajibikile bunyawu
Minyinyi ya mu mayi yonsu kulua
Yonatana wakambila Davidi ne
Kadi Yozefe uvua udiila ku ende mesa pa nkayende, bana babu ku makuabu mesa
Dilolo nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku butshie bualu bua buowa budi bunukuata mu mitshima yenu, ne bua malu anudi batangila ku mesu
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama ne mundi udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe
Yeye wakalumbulula Bena Isalele bidimu muanda mutekete
Bualu bua tuetu tutu tuadia luehu lua ku nsubu wa mukelenge, kambimpe bua tuetu kutangila bundu bua mukelenge, nunku tuakufunda mukanda eu bua kumanyisha mukelenge wetu; bua yeye atangile mu mikanda yakafunda batatu andi ne habaleye mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a musoko eu, neamanye biandi ne musoko eu udi wa batomboki batu benzela hakelenge ne nseke bibi kale tô ne katataka; anu bua bualu ebu bakabutuisha musoko eu
Bialua tshiole mu buloba, anyi disama dikole, anyi biakuata butu anyi bishi, anyi bialua mikumbi anyi meshi, anyi biabatshintshimika bena lukuna babo mu buloba bua misoko yabo, bikalabo ne dikenga kai anyi disama kai; biakutendelela anyi biakutendekena muntu umue anyi Bena Isalele bonso, biamanya muntu yonso dikenga dia mutshima wandi, ne biolololeye bianza biandi ku nsubu eu; ubunvuile mu diulu kûdi ushikama, ubabuikidile mibi yabo, ubenzele bu mûdi mumanye malu adi mu mitshima yabo bualu bua anu wewe nkayebe ngudi mumanye mitshima ya bantu bonso ; bua bobo bakutshine matuku onso adibo bashikame mu buloba buwakaha bankambua babo

Au mmei ne mikenji bakambila Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko
Hakafua Mose, yeye wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi: mesu andi kâkadi bileshileshi ne bukole buandi kabuakahua
Ufundepu bu tshitampi ne: Wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila
Yeye wakamba ku mpala kua bana babo ne kua masalayi a Bena Samalea, wakabebesha ne, Bena Yuda aba batekete badi benza tshinyi
Uvua mubuelele mukajanyi mukuabu mu nzubu
diepele dia masama a bipupu ne a nyama adi mwa kujiwula bantu;
Nunku halua tshidimu tshia disanka dia Bena Isalele, buhianyi buabo nebusangishibue ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo, nunku buhianyi buabo nebumuke ku buhianyi bua batatu etu
Hashishe mukashi wandi Zeleshe ne balunda bandi bakamuambila ne, Balongolole tshiowelu bule bua coudées makumi atanu, hatshiabu wewe wambile mukelenge bua kuowelaku Môdekai; hashishe neumanye mua kuya ne mukelenge ne disanka ku bidia bia disanka dinene
Bena Isalele nebadishimikile ntenta yabo, mundi ne muntu ku tshitudilu tshiandi, hehi ne dibendele diandi ku bisumbu biabo
Kadi bena mvita bavua kabayi ne mianzu, bavua balame bintu bionsu bivuabu bapete mu mvita
Tatu wa mushikankunde neambile bakulu ne, Nakafila muan anyi kudi mulume eu bu mukashi wandi, ne yeye udi umukina; yeye wakambila bakuabo mei a bundu ne, Tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi muana webe; kadi ebi mbimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Biakuenzelabo bibi bualu bua kakuena muntu udi kayi ne mibi ne biwikala n abo tshiji, biwabafila kudi bena lukuna babo, ne biayabo n abo mu buhika ku buloba budi kule anyi budi ha buihi; kadi bielanganabo meji mu buloba buwakabatuma mu buhika, biakudimunabo mitshima yabo, biakutendekenabo mu buloba bua buhika buabo bamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi, tuakubambuka mu nshila, tuakasesuka mu malu mabi; biakudimunabo mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo kûdi mu buloba bua buhika buabo kuakaya bantu n abo mu buhika, ne biatendelelabo bua buloba buabo buwakaha batatu abo ne bua musoko eu uwakusungula, ne bua nsubu eu unakuibakila dina diebe; unvue biebe mu diulu, muaba webe ûdi mushikame mene, kutendelela kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo, ujadike malu abo, ubuikidile bantu bebe bakukuenzela bibi mibi yabo
Kumusokokaye ngondu isatu
Biumuka Muena Lewi ku umue wa misoko ya mu Isalele, muakadiye ushikama, bua kubuela ne mutshima wandi wonso mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula, hashishe yeye neanuenzele mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wandi; bu mudi bana babo, Bena Lewi, batu bimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, benza
Anu dituku adi, Labane kuumusha mbuji ya mpumbu yonsu ivua ne mipolu nansha ivua ne matoba pambidi
Mukelenge wakashikama mu nkuasa wandi hehi ne tshimanu tshia nsubu bu muakenzeye matuku makuabo; Yonatana wakimana ha muaba wandi, ne Abinê wakashikama ku luseke lua Shaula; kadi nkuasa wa Davidi wakadi mushale hatuhu
Baluishi nebabatshimune
Hashishe Sihona wakalua kutudi ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu nvita ku Yahasa
Meme kuitaba, kusungula bantu dikumi ne babidi ba munkatshi muenu, umue ku tshisamba tshionsu
Bantu ba mu bisumbu bisatu bakela mpungi, bakashiha milondo, bakakuata bimunyi mu bianza biabo bia bakashi ne mpungi mu bianza bia balume bua kuyela; bakela mbila ne, Muele wa nvita wa Yehowa ne wa Gideona

Bana ba Hashuma nkama isatu ne makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu

Nukose tshilumbu anu muditshi

Yoshua Udi Unyenga Buloba Bujima Nunku Yoshua wakanyenga buloba abu buonso, ne buloba bua mikuna ne luseke lujima lua ku Sude, ne buloba buonso bua Goshene, ne bibanda, ne Alabâ, ne buloba bua mikuna ya Isalele ne bibanda biabu; ku mukuna wa Halaka wa ku nshila wa ku Sei tô ne ku Bâla gada wa mu tshibanda tshia Lebanona kuinshi kua mukuna wa Hêmona; wakakuata bakelenge hai bonso, wakabataha, wakabashiha

Hashishe Sanebalata wakatuma muntu wandi kundi musangu muitanu ne mukanda mubulula mu tshianza tshiandi, ne mei mafunda nunku ne, Lumu luakatangadika munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia bantu ne, Gesheme udi wamba bualu ebu ne, Wewe ne Bena Yuda nudi nuelangana meji bua kutomboka; bua bualu ebu wewe udi wibaka lumbu elu; wewe udi musue kuikala mukelenge wabo bu mudi mei â

Mikenji Neyitekibue mu Mushete wa Tshihungidi tshia Mei Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi

Bana balume ba Isaka: Esau ne Isalele
Bantu aba badi balami ba mikoko, bualu bua bakadi balami ba bimuna, bakalua ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi

Nuvuluke ne: ndi munupeshe dituku dia muanda mutekete bua dikale dia dikisha
Nunku wewe wakabafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo, bakabakengesha; mu tshikondo tshia dikenga diabo hakadilabo kûdi, wewe wakabunvuila mu diulu; bu mudi bunene bua luse luebe wewe wakabaha basungidi bakabasungila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo

Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Nom
Hashishe Asa wakangata bintu bionso bia argent ne bia or biakadi bishale mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakabifila mu bianza bia bantu bandi; mukelenge Asa wakabatuma kudi Bene hadada, muana wa Tabelimona, muana wa Hezeyona, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakadi ushikama mu Damaseke, bamba ne, Tshihungidi tshikale hankatshi hetu n ebe bu muakaditshi hankatshi ha tatu wanyi ne tatu webe; ndi nkutumina argent ne or; ya biebe, ushihe tshihungidi tshiwakahunga ne Bâsha, mukelenge wa Isalele, bua yeye Umuke kundi
Hakafikabo ku tshihehuidi tshia Kidona, Uza wakolola tshianza tshiandi bua kukuateye mushete; bualu bua ngombe yakadishinda hanshi
Bantu bandi bakamuambula mu dikalu bua kuya ku Yelushalema, bakamujika mu lukita lua bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Kakahanda dime diakadi hanshi, monai, tshintu tshikese tshibulunge tshiakadi ha tshihela, tshiakadi tshikese bu dime dikuatakane ha buloba
Bua Yosefe yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishile buloba buandi disanka, bua bintu bia mushinga mukole bia mu diulu, bua mume, ne bua mai adi muinshi mua buloba; ne bua bintu biakakuama mamuma bualu bua diba, ne bua bintu bidi belangana ku ngondo ku ngondo; bua bintu bimpe bia mu mikuna, ne bua mabue a mushinga mukole a mu mikuna ya tshiendelele; ne bua bintu bimpe bia ha buloba ne tshiuwidi tshiabu, ne bua diakalengele dia bantu badi bashikama muitu
Kadi yeye nkayandi wakaya luendu lua dituku dimue mu tshihela, wakashikama hanshi muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt; wakalomba Nzambi bua kufueye, wamba ne, Kuakushika mpindiu, Yehowa angate muoyo wanyi, bualu bua meme tshiena muhite batatu banyi buakane
Nunku halua matata ne makenga makole kudibo, musambu eu newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu, neudiambe kudibo; bana babo kabahu musambu eu muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi mumanye meji adibo n au mu mitshima yabo lelu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua n abo mu buloba bunakabalaya

Rebeka kushala muena kuende

Au mmena atu: Bene hû, wa ku mikuna va Efelayima; Bene dekê, wa ku Makasa ne ku Shâlabima ne ku Bete shemeshe ne ku Elona bete hanana; Bene hesede, wa mu Alubota; ne wa mu Soko ne buloba bua Hefê ; Bene abinadaba, wa ku mikuna ya Dô; Tafata, muana wa Solomo, wakadi mukashi wandi ; Bana, muana wa Alihuda wa mu Tanaka ne mu Megido ne mu buloba buonso bua Bete sheana budi ku luseke lua Saletana muinshi mua Yizelele ku Bete sheana ne Abele mehola tô ne ku Yokenama; Bene gebê, wa mu Lamota gilada, wakadi ne misoko ya Yaî, muana wa Manashe, idi mu Gilada; ne buloba bua Âgoba bua mu Bashana, misoko makumi asambombo yakadi ne ngumbu ne bibi bia tshiamu tshia mitaku ; Abinadaba, muana wa Ido wa mu Mahanayima; Ahimasa, wa mu Nafatale; Basemata, muana wa Solomo, wakadi mukashi wandi ; Bana, muana wa Hushai, wa mu Ashê ne Bealota; Yehoshafata, muana wa Palua, wa mu Yisakâ; Shimei, muana wa Ela, wa mu Benyamina; Gebê, muana wa Uli, wa mu buloba bua Gilada, buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, ne bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana; anu yeye wakadi kahita kamue mu buloba abu

Hakumuka bakuidi mu muaba wa tshijila, ditutu diakûsha nsubu wa Yehowa tente, nunku bakuidi kabakamanya mua kuenza midimu yabo bualu bua ditutu edi; bualu bua butumbi bua Yehowa buakûsha nsubu wa Yehowa tente

Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia diumvwangana ne ndondo ne matunga makwabo, tshinyangu tshiônso tshia bulume ne bukaji tshienzela muntu bwa kusendekeja, kupandulula dîku ne kubutula tshisamba tshijima badi batshitangila bu tshibawu tshienzela bumuntu tshidibo banyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Mose wakaya ne mifuba ya Yosefe, bualu bua yeye wakatshihisha Bena Isalele ne, Nzambi nealue kunudi bulelela, nuenu nenuye ne mifuba yanyi
Yakobe kuandamuna ne: Bua meme kukupesha nsupu wa nkunde ewu, bangabanga unsumbishe bumuanabute buebe
Kuambaye ne: Muana ewu ngua bena Ebrewu
Yeye wakambila Efelona ku mpala kua bena buloba ne, Biwitabusha, ndi nkutendekena ne, Ungunvuile, nenkuhe mushinga wa budimi uwangate ne meme nenjikemu tshitalu etshi
Muana wa bakashi wa Palô wakalua kuowa mai mu musulu au, bantu bandi bakashi bakendakana ku muelelu wa mai, yeye wakamona tshisaka mu malenge, wakatuma muntu wandi ne, Ya utshiangate
Mose wakitabusha bua tatu andi muenu ahingane, yeye wakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba buandi
Nakabatuma kudi Ido, muntu munene, ku muaba wa Kasifaya; nakabambila mei a kuambilabo Ido ne bana babo, Bena Netinima, ku muaba wa Kasifaya, bua bobo balue kutudi ne benji ba mudimu wa nsubu wa Nzambi wetu
Zekâya, muana wa Meshelemiya, wakadi mulami wa ku tshibuelelu tshia mu nsubu wa kusambakena
Ei idi nyama mudi mua kudia: ngombe ne mukoko ne mbushi, mbashi ne kabuluku ne ntole ne mbushi wa ha mpata, ne lusumbi, ne ngulungu ne mukoko wa mu mikuna
Mabue a makunshi akadi manene a mushinga mukole, bunene bua makuabo buakadi coudées dikumi, ne bua makuabo buakadi coudées muanda mukulu
Aba mbana ba balume ba Esau, aba mbakelenge babo, eu udi Edome
Nuatendelelaku bualu buanyi
Wewe Kora ne bonsu banudi nabu, nuangate mbabula
Uvuluke bantu bebe, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba; kutangidi tshitshu tshia bantu aba anyi buhidia buabo anyi mibi yabo, bua bena buloba buwakatuhatula kabambi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua n abo mu buloba buakahaneye ne bualu bua yeye wakadi n abo tshiji, yeye wakalua n abo mu tshihela bua kubashiha
Dimue dituku tshikondu tshia kunowa ntete ya kuenza bukula, Rubene kuya mu madimi bua kukebela mamuende Leya bimuma bia mutshi wa dinanga
Bulelela, kanyinganyinga ka lufu kakashika
Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana, hanuihatshileye bisamba bia bungi ku mpala kuenu, Bena Hiti ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bisamba muanda mutekete bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole; habafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu bianza bienu, nenubashihe; hashishe nenubajimishe ha buloba: kanuhungi n abo tshihungidi, kanubaleshi luse, kanubakanganyi n abo, kanubakishi muan enu mukashi kudi muana wabo mulume, kanuangatshidi muana wenu mulume mukashi kudibo
Bakabaha misoko ei ituakutela mena ai ku nshobo mu tshisamba tshia Yuda ne tshia Shimeona ne tshia Benyamina
Nunku nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai, bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Nembashihe
Nempatule ndelanganyi yebe mu ditunga adi
Yeye kena ne bualu bua kudiangatshila bakashi ba bungi bua kukudimuneye mutshima wandi; yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila biamu bia argent ne bia or
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayende nealengeje mioyi yenu, ne ya ndelanganyi yenu, bua numunange ne muoyi mujima, ne bukole buenu buonsu, bua nuenu kushala ne muoyi
Bakalembelesha bilulu bitoke ne bia mai a matamba ne bia bleu bilamakasha ne mionshi ya lin mikunzubile ku nkanu ya argent, misuika ku makunshi a mabue a marbre; matanda akadi a or ne a argent mateke ha tshiendedi tshia mabue a marbre makunze ne matoke ne makunzubile ne mafike
Mmubapeshe bipedi bia kusonga mabue a mushinga mukole, kuzola bilamba bia miosa ya nyama, bifikuluke, bikunzubile, bikunze kunzuu, ne bia ndanda
Yeye wakamba ne, Unvuai mei anyi, bikala muprofete munkatshi muenu, meme Yehowa nendimanyishe kudiye mu tshikena kumona, meme nensombe n andi mu tshilota
Yozefe kuandamuna ne: Ndi nkeba bana betu
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Davidi wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Binuelangana meji ne mbimpe, ne biasua Yehowa Nzambi wetu nunku, tubikile bana betu bonso badi bashala mu nseke yonso ya buloba bua Isalele ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi badi mu misoko yabo ne ku mpenge ya misoko yabo, badisangishe kutudi; tuye bietu, tuangate mushete wa Nzambi wetu, tulue n au munkatshi muetu; bualu bua tuetu katuakûkeba mu matuku a Shaula
Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa dikumi, nsongu ya mikuna kumueneka
Moshe kuangata tshiadi tshia tshimpanga atshi, kutshiela mulu, kutshinyukula
Nunku mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakadia bidia; mutshima wandi kawakadi unyingalala kabidi
Dutelonone Misoko ya Kunyemena Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba abi bia mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabihata, hanuaslukama mu misoko yabo ne mu nsubu yabo, nenuditahuluile misoko isatu mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Nudiundishe mudimu wabo, bawenze, nunku kabitabushi mei a mashimi
Shamehuta, Muena Yisela, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo muitanu; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Biwabakengesha ne biadilabo kundi, meme nengunvuile muadi wabo, ne tshiji tshianyi netshitambe bukole, nennushihe ne muele wa nvita, ne bakashi benu nebikale bakashi ba mu lufuila ne bana benu nebikale bana ba nshiya
Nenufundehu mikenji ei hanuasabuka; nunku nenubuele mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, munulaye
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ku bianza bia bena mudimu ba banfumu ba mu buloba buebe
Bantu hakahingana, bakamanyisha mukelenge
Nanku Maweja Nangila kumushipesha
Davidi wakamuambila ne, Mashi ebe ikale ha mutu hebe bualu bua mukana muebe muakukuhisha, muamba ne, Nakashiha muntu wakela Yehowa manyi ha mutu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge wanyi, wewe muntu wa Nzambi, kudingi muntu webe mukashi
Bena Isalele bakatumina Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, mukelenge wa mu Heshebona, ba messager; Bena Isalele bakamuambila ne, Tudi tukusengelela ne, Witabushe bua tuetu kuhitshila mu buloba buebe, tuye ku buloba buetu
Ngombe ne mikoku kubapesha mabele
Kadi meme nempeshe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu muoyi wa tshitunu
Bansongakaji kupingana pambelu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Biwakuma bisumbu bia nsuki yanyi muanda mutekete mu mbungu
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue
Bana betu bakatekesha mitshima yetu, bakamba ne, Bantu aba badi batuhita hunene ne bule; misoko yabo idi minene, ne mpangu yai ya mabue idi miye mulu mule; bualu bukuabo, tuakatangilamu bana balume ba Bena Anaka
Nutumikile, nunvue mei onso anakanuambila: nunku nenukune dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima tshiendelele, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ne makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi kakuakadi muntu umue munkatshi muabo wakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Nowa udi upatuka mu buatu Mayi kushala matengabela pa buloba matuku lukama ne makumi atanu
Kadi padi muntu awu ne dikeji ditoke pambidi, mputa kayi mondoke, kabidi boya kabuyi butokoloke, mutuangaji neumushe muntu awu munkatshi mua bantu
Bapete kabidi pabuipi nabi mpata ya kudishila bimuna biabu, ne nyama mikuabu idibu mua kupeta
